home.title: Harshad Swaminarayan Mandir
home.subtitle: A sacred place for spiritual growth, community, and devotion
home.description: Harshad Swaminarayan Mandir is a place of worship, community, and spiritual growth. Our temple serves as a center for Hindu religious activities, cultural events, and educational programs for devotees of all ages.
home.noEvents: No upcoming events at this time. Please check back later.
